DOC.brief_title: Trans Fatty Acids Cardiovascular Risk Factors

DOC.criteria: HDL cholesterol , g/L > 0.4 Triacylglycerol g/L < 1.50 LDL Cholesterol g/L < 1.60 Affiliated National Health Insurance Waist size < 102 cm ( men ) 88 cm ( woman ) Normal blood pressure ( diastolic < 90 mm Hg , systolic < 140 mm Hg ) Normal liver function ( γGT , transaminase , alkaline phosphatase ) Normal white blood cell count ( 410 g/L ) For woman : effective contraception Subject give his/her write informed consent Subject willing comply study procedure Subject consider normal clinical examination medical questionnaire Reported food allergy Currently participate participate another clinical trial last 4 week prior begin study Hepatic renal impairment Positive serology HIV HCV , determine blood sample For woman , pregnant presently attempt get pregnant ( HCG blood test ) menopause lactate Blood donation do less 2 month start study Chronic pathology : diabetes ( fast glycaemia > 6,1 mmol/L ) , hypertriglyceridemia ( ≥1.50 g/L ) , hypertension ( systolic blood pressure ≥ 140 mm Hg and/or diastolic blood pressure ≥ 90 mm Hg ) , cardiovascular disease , chronic inflammatory disease Intestine , cardiovascular , kidney cancer pathology last 5 year Previous heavy intestine surgery ( except appendicectomy ) Previous medical and/or surgery judge investigator incompatible study High variation ( > 5 % ) body weight last 3 month Consuming nutritional supplement could interfere lipid metabolism ( fish oil capsule , vitamin , soja lecithin , … ) Heavy consumer alcohol ( evaluated thanks value follow hepatic enzyme : GT , ASAT , ALAT ) Smoker exsmoker stop smoke less 1 month V0 Practicing intensive physical exercise ( > 3 h per week ) Vegetarian vegan Taking medication depressive psychiatric state Being someone 's supervision Refusal register National Volunteers Data file Disliking butter , margarine , cheese , biscuits and/or vegetable oil Dietary habit unreliable control food intake Being exclusion National Volunteers Data file
